content: **free pattern here** https //thelagombox com/crochetpatterns/whispering-mushroom-crochet-pattern this woodland mini-mushroom crochet pattern is quick simple and full of charm you can use it as cozy home decor wear it as a necklace turn it into a whimsical keychain clip it onto your bag as a forest-inspired charm or even hang it on your christmas tree as a sweet handmade ornament it s perfect for using up leftover yarn scraps and makes a lovely little gift for kids students or anyone who loves magical handmade things **skill level ** easy **yarn ** fine 2 weight yarn in i used red glitter lurex yarn lucky ball for the cap 1 white lotus yarns silky cashmere for the stalk 2 **crochet hook ** 2 0 mm b 3 embroidery needles 4 stitch markers 5 scissors 6 poly fill stuffing 7 **size ** if a 2 0mm crochet hook is used your personalized mushroom will be approximately 6 5 cm tall about 2 3 inches tall you can use the same pattern to make smaller or larger mushroom by using thinner or thicker yarn **abbreviations** *written in u s crochet terms* **magic_ring** -
